article.title: Research Laboratory Awards Geolocation Contracts
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: ObjectVideo, Reston, Virginia, is being awarded a $15,636,013 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for the FINDER Program, which aims to build existing research systems to develop technology that augments the analyst's abilities to address the geolocation task.Â BAE Systems, Burlington, Maine, is being awarded a $13,784,273 for the same program. Air Force Research Laboratory, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
